namePage.title: Limited partnership name
namePage.whatIsName: What is the limited partnership name?
namePage.whatIsNameHint: Do not enter a name ending, like Limited Partnership or LP. We'll add this for you.
namePage.checkName: Check the limited partnership name against an existing trademark
namePage.checkNameExistingLP: You must check the name is not the same as an existing limited partnership on the Companies House register (link opens in a new tab). If it is, we will reject your application.
namePage.checkNameExistingTrademark: You should also use the trade mark search (link opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.
namePage.nameEnding: Which limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?
namePage.nameEndingHint: There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except for how they look.
namePage.existingPartnershipHint: You must check the name is not the same as an existing partnership or company on the Companies House register (opens in a new tab). If it is, we’ll reject your application.
namePage.sensitiveWordHint: If the name includes sensitive words or expressions that require approval (opens in a new tab), you must get permission before you register.
namePage.existingTrademarkHint: You should also use the trade mark search (opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.

privateNamePage.title: Private fund limited partnership name
privateNamePage.whatIsName: What's the name of the private fund limited partnership?
privateNamePage.whatIsNameHint: Do not enter a name ending like Limited Partnership or LP. We will add this for you.
privateNamePage.nameEndingHint: There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except for how they look.
privateNamePage.existingPartnershipHint: You must check the name is not the same as an existing partnership or company on the Companies House register (opens in a new tab). If it is, we’ll reject your application.
privateNamePage.sensitiveWordHint: If the name includes sensitive words or expressions that require approval (opens in a new tab), you must get permission before you register.
privateNamePage.existingTrademarkHint: Use the trade mark search (link opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.
privateNamePage.nameEnding: Which private fund limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

whichTypePage.title: Which type of partnership do you want to register?

options.registerLp: Limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
options.registerPflp: Private fund limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
options.registerPflpSco: Private fund limited partnership in Scotland

generalPartnersPage.title: You now need to tell us about the general partners
generalPartnersPage.pageInformation: If the partnership has more than one general partner, you'll add them one at a time.

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.spelling: If you typed the web address, check it is spelled correctly.
pageNotFound.copiedAddress: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound.movedPage: If the web address is correct or you selected a link, the page may have moved.
pageNotFound.goToStartPage: To register a limited partnership, go to the Register a limited partnership start page.

errorPage.title: Sorry, the service is unavailable
errorPage.tryLater: You will be able to use the service at a later date.
errorPage.moreInfo: Email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk, if you need more information.
